name: Minimalist sterling silver earrings SINGLE black
description:
funky and modern earrings made with mother of pearl and sterling silver.

The bigger disc (24mm-0.94") is an amazing mother of pearl button and the smaller (18mm-0.7") is sterling silver with a brush finished.

This listing is for the BLACK single earrings . This model of earrings is made in "single", "double", "big double" and "triple" design and in multiple color combinations.
if you want other color or size, please visit  my shop.
http://www.etsy.com/shop/iomiss

Size: 36 mm - 1,5" from the top of the sterling silver hook.
They arrive in a high quality rigid box perfect for gifting.

Note: Since the pieces are handmade, sizes can be slightly varied from one another
Items shown are not actual size as photos have been enlarged or enhanced to show detail. Actual color may vary slightly depending on the screen resolution and quality of monitor you are using.


Thanks so much for your visit, hope you like all my designs!
please, feel free to contact me for full information on shipping and wholesale conditions

name: Sterling Silver flower and Chrysoprase Earrings
description:
These earrings are made with 925 sterling silver hook, faceted natural Chrysoprase stone and a beautiful 925 sterling silver flower with a brush finished.

Size: 50mm - 2" from the top of the sterling silver hook
They arrive in a high quality rigid box perfect for gifting.

Note: Since the pieces are handmade and are used natural stones, sizes and color can be slightly varied from one another
Items shown are not actual size as photos have been enlarged or enhanced to show detail. Actual color may vary slightly depending on the screen resolution and quality of monitor you are using.
